pages.text: The fruit press is primarily used to make $(o)juice$() from grapes or apples that can then be fermented into $(l:cellar/wines_and_ciders)Wines and Ciders$().$(br2)Activate the piston top with a redstone signal (usually by attaching a lever to the top), and watch for drainage particles until completed.$(br2)Typically requires 4 fruit to produce 1 bucket of juice.
